item.title: How to install jykell on mac!
item.description: 如何在mac上安装jykell 1.安装rvm curl -L get.rvm.io | bash -s stable source ~/.rvm/scripts/rvm rvm -v 2.安装ruby rvm install 2.6.0 rvm list 3.安装jykell gem source gem install jekyll jekyll -version 4.安装bun
